medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain, nausea, and vomiting localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began early in the morning, initially improved but later became localized to the RLQ. Patient reports no fevers or chills, no changes in bowel habits, and no urinary symptoms.
medical_history.family_history: Father died of prostate cancer; mother is well.
